EmailTemplate.subject: Wright Express Small Business Fuel Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in our Wright Express fuel card programs. As we discussed earlier today, we do offer a business card program which includes many of the same features of our Fleet Card program, but simplified in areas especially for businesses like yours. Following are some highlights:
Acceptance – The card is accepted at more than 90% of retail fuel merchants nationwide. You also have the option to allow your cards to be accepted at an additional 35,000 service merchant locations.
Ease of Use – The driver is only required to enter the correct Driver Identification Number at the pump and then fuel.
Real Savings – Always find the lowest prices and save at the pump using our mobile device and online tools.
Online Management – You can manage your cards, view reports and even pay your bill online.
Administrative Aid – All fuel charges and vehicle related expenses appear on one invoice.
Customer Service – With Wright Express you get live, U.S. based customer service for you and your drivers, 24/7.
If you have any questions, or would like additional details about this program, please give me a call at <telephone number>
<sales rep name> Inside Sales Consultant
